about_the_game:
“Minds Beneath Us: Original Soundtrack” has been composed to merge with the cyberpunk universe of Minds Beneath Us with an immersive soundtrack made up of 35 pieces of music with a unique ambiance.
An original soundtrack that will accompany you throughout your adventure, letting you feel the emotion and intensity of this world.

All the music was composed, performed, produced, and mixed by Kevin “Kounine” Colombin.

This OST does not include the Ending Theme Song " 10-Year-Taipei (Matured '17) " by Sunset Rollercoaster
